div.p: Content Packages are specially formatted packages containing Entities, Audio & Graphics, that help users start creating games and import new media.
Content Packages (.package) are GZip compressed format with each files store as name length, name, file length and file data.
This format was chosen for simplistically over other format like Tar and ZIP.

Content packages uses '.package' extension, and Alchera automatically add to the New Project listing when they are copied into My Document\alchera\.mokoi directory or similar directory on non-windows system.
Packages can be import at a later date via the Import option under Project Menu.
Creating Content Packages works the same as creating a game, except you use the 'Export' option instead of the 'Compile'.
Fill in the dialog, then you can email the package file, located in My Documents\alchera\.mokoi, to mokoigaming@gmail.com and it will be added to list.
If you got any other questions feel free to ask.
